content.name: All's Fair in Tug of War
content.description: The objective is to beat the competition and win the match by winning at least two of the three pulls in the match.
rules: The rope used should be of a circumference of approximately 11 cm and should be marked in the middle with a center line as well as two marks that should be placed 4m from the center line.
At the start of the pull, the center line of the rope should be immediately above the line marked on the ground.
Both teams pull the rope, the winner being the team who manages to pull the mark on the rope closest to their opponents over the center line.
The rope must be pulled underarm and nobodyâ€™s elbow must go below the knee,otherwise a foul will be called.
Matches are often the best of three pulls, the winner winning two out of the three pulls.
